thought: To craft a trapped_chest, I first need to craft a tripwire_hook. To do so, I will place an iron_ingot on slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

thought: To craft a trapped chest, I need to place a chest and a tripwire hook adjacent to each other in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move the tripwire hook from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
